29.4. [Hrabanus Maurus] Commentum in librum Exodum.
Commentary | Exodus
Manuscripts:
1. Angers, Bibliothèque municipale 295 (286), f. 1-9mo] Expositio in Ioelem Propetam.8. saec. xii; P: St-Aubin.
2. Armagh, Public Library, G.II.7. saec. xii4/4; Pontigny; Allard.
3. Bologna, Biblioteca Universitaria 646 (1191). saec. xiii.
4. Cambridge, Trinity College 47 (B.2.4), f. 112-152. saec. xii. Canterbury. *
5. Douai, Bibliothèque municipale 339, f. 1v-68v. saec. xii; P: Anchin. (S)
6. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 231 (268). saec. xii.
7. Karlsruhe. Landesbibliothek Aug. perg. xlix, p. 103-238. saec. ix. Reichenau. Follows Hrabanus on Genesis. (S) *
8. Laon, Bibliothèque municipale 6. saec. ix. Notre Dame de Laon.
9. Madrid. Biblioteca Nacionale 102 (254; B 5), f. 47va-104rb. saec. xiv. Follows Hrabanus on Genesis. (S) *
10. Oxford, Bodleian Library Laud 6. saec. ix. (S)
11. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 2424 (Colbert 1005, Reg. 3812.1). saec xii ex. Follows Hrabanus on Genesis. (S)
12. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France, lat. 2425. saec. xii; Autun, Abbey of Fontenay. 135 ff.
13. Paris. Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 13188, f. 17-48. saec. xii. St. Germain-des-Prés. Follows Hrabanus on Genesis. (S)*
14. Saint-Mihiel, 25, f. 74v-. saec. x. Benedictines. No attribution in MS. Variant version of the text.
15. Tours, Bibliothèque municipale 69, f. 51v-108v. saec. xi. No attribution in MS.  *
16. Tours, Bibliothèque municipale 70, f. 53va.-102v.  saec. xii.
17. Tours, Bibliothèque municipale 82, f. 3-144. saec. xii ex.; P: Tours, St. Gatien. As a marginal gloss.
18. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 64, f. 87ra-179vb. saec. xii. Clairvaux.
19. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 559, f. 1-118v. saec. ix3/4. Oratoire; Pithou. (S)
20. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 1557, f. 82-103. saec. xi; Bouhier. Variant text; Stegmüller 7022,1. Inc. Exodus egressio vel exitus dicitur. Et est graecum. Surrexit interea rex novus super Aegyptum, qui ignorabat Ioseph. Quinque reges fuerunt in Aegypto ab illo, cuius gratiam meruit Joseph usque ad exitum filiorum Israel, qui propriis nominibus ...
Fragments:
1. Cologne, Archiv der Stadt Köln W 144, f. 163-164. Saec. xi. Bool II, ch. 4
2. Cologne, Archiv der Stadt Köln W* 139, f. 35v-75. saec. xii2.
3. Würzburg, Univeersitätsbibliothek M.p.th.f.70, f. 145v-149v. saec. ixmed. Extract from Book IV.
